code: import React from"react";import'../../style/pagination.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pagination=_ref=>{let{currentPage,totalPages,onPageChange}=_ref;const pageNumbers=[];for(let i=1;i<=totalPages;i++){pageNumbers.push(i);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pagination",children:pageNumbers.map(number=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onPageChange(number),className:number===currentPage?'active':'',children:number},number))});};export default Pagination;
